text: Yalli xiibiteh nummah, kay farmoyta Mucammad soono numm√¢ soono abeemil, Yalli xiibiteh diggah masjid al-caram (makka kinnuk) culettoonumul Yalli faxek sinni moyyaayi moole maraa kee yirgiqe marah anuk meesitekal saayah anuk. Edde luk Yalli isin aaxigewaytaanam yeexegeeh, isin faxak sugteenimik fanaak xayi fakim siinih abe (kheybar fakim kinnuk)
